CodeBlockMethod.Name: SetUI
CodeBlockMethod.Code:
local BuildingEntity = self.Entity
if Enable == true then self.CalledBy.Building:IncreaseUsingCount() else self.CalledBy.Building:DecreaseUsingCount() end
BuildingEntity:SetVisible(Enable) BuildingEntity:SetEnable(Enable)

CodeBlockEntityEventHandler.Name: HandleButtonClickEvent
CodeBlockEntityEventHandler.Code:
-- Parameters local Entity = event.Entity -------------------------------------------------------- if isvalid(self.CalledBy) then self:SetUI(false) else local DestinationInfo = _EntityService:GetEntityByPath("/ui/DestinationInfoUI/DestinationInfo")
DestinationInfo:SetVisible(false) DestinationInfo:SetEnable(false) end
self.CalledBy = nil
